name: Squiggly Squabble
description:
WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS AND COLORS

Also original jam version downloadable below

Controls
  • Movement - WASD / Arrow keys
  • Overload Explosion - Space
  • Focus / More precise, but slower movement - Shift
Plot

Rude dogs are throwing cucumbers at you! You must dodge everything and protect the most delicate part of your body: your NOSE!

Overload explosion explanation: the bar in the lower part of the screen charges as time passes. When you press space, you explode nearby bullets and the bar goes back to 0%. The closer the bar is to 100% when you press space, the bigger the explosion area, but if you let it get to 100% you explode to death.

Credits
  • Art by Pedestrek and Happy Potatomato
  • Code by Fenisu, Happy Potatomato, Pedestrek and Ceccro
  • Made with Godot v3.4.2
